ProjectTitle: Policy recommendations for a pharmaceutical R&D and evaluation  framework that is driven by unmet medical needs
InitialFeedbackHistory:
16/02/2023
Documentation and metadata: Please explain how you will document your data, will you use protocols, SOPs, readme files and/or code books for example? Do the databases that you use add metadata? for more information see: https://www.kuleuven.be/rdm/en/guidance/documentation-metadata
Storage: You mention that you will use sharepoint with a 5GB capacity, but according to your table you collect multiple datasets of about 100GB, please consult the storage guide to find additional storage solutions: https://icts.kuleuven.be/storagewijzer/en
label: good with suggestions
